name: Extract
description:
THE RETURNERS ROSE FROM CRACKS IN THE EARTH...

SEAS ROSE, CITIES FELL, AND ALL WENT DARK.

THE RETURNERS USED THE DARKNESS TO THEIR ADVANTAGE.

THE LIGHT WAS THEIR ONLY WEAKNESS.

THE LIGHT MAKES THEM FLEE...

BUT IT SEEMS AS IF THEY CANNOT DIE...

Game Boy & Mobile In-Browser Controls:

Up/Down/Left/Right - Move
A - Pick Up Item / Use Switch
B - Use Flare
Select - Check Flares
Start - Pause

Non-Mobile In-Browser Controls:

Up/Down/Left/Right or W/A/S/D - Move
Z - Pick Up Item / Use Switch
X - Use Flare
Shift - Check Flares
Enter - Pause

This Halloween Game Boy demo was made with GB Studio for Scream Jam 2019 by a one-person dev "team" in five days, part-time.

This demo is a prototype/playable alpha. There are major bugs with enemy graphics in both versions, and some minor bugs with sound in the in-browser version.
